personalInfo.name: Ajay Kumar
personalInfo.title: Frontend Developer
personalInfo.bio: Passionate about building beautiful, functional, and user-friendly web experiences.
personalInfo.description: Hi, I'm Ajay Kumar, a passionate Frontend Developer based in Haryana, India. I specialize in crafting engaging and user-friendly interfaces using modern web technologies like React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
personalInfo.education: Diploma in Computer Engineering from CRP Rohtak (completed in 2023)
personalInfo.additionalInfo: I hold a Diploma in Computer Engineering from CRP Rohtak (completed in 2023) and have since gained practical experience building real-world applications. My focus is on writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code while ensuring a great user experience across all devices. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy tackling complex UI challenges. From building intricate dashboards with real-time data to implementing robust design systems, I'm always eager to learn and apply new techniques to deliver high-quality results. Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and contributing to open-source projects. Let's connect and build something amazing together!

description: Implemented new features and optimized performance.

projects.title: GetStatus – Urban Renewal Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive platform facilitating communication and data management for urban renewal projects, connecting multiple stakeholders.
features: Real-time project status updates & data synchronization
Interactive map integration using govMap API principles
Permission-based UI tailored to user roles
projects.impact: Significantly improved project transparency, streamlined communication between stakeholders, and enhanced user engagement with urban renewal initiatives.

projects.title: HRMS Internal System
projects.description: An internal Human Resource Management System designed to manage employee data, attendance, leave, and loans efficiently.
features: Leave application and approval workflow module
Employee loan request and management system
Comprehensive admin dashboards for HR personnel
Complex data table layouts with sorting and filtering
projects.impact: Automated key HR processes, reduced manual errors, improved attendance accuracy, and provided better insights into employee data for management.

projects.title: Bibico – Influencer Marketing Platform
projects.description: A platform connecting brands with influencers for marketing campaigns, featuring localization and real-time tracking.
features: Advanced search and filtering for influencers and campaigns
Admin dashboard for relationship management and platform oversight
Secure API integrations for campaign data
projects.impact: Enabled brands to effectively find and collaborate with influencers globally, improving campaign reach and management efficiency.
